item.title: [PI] Usewith not working :(
item.dc:creator: @flexie2 flexie2
item.description:
@flexie2 wrote:

Hello,

Iâ€™m trying to make some methods for herblore.
I tried editting the UseItem.java.
I made this for now but its not working:

if ( itemUsed == 260 && useWith == 5936 ) { // Irit on Coconut milk
	c.getItems().addItem(5953,1); // Add antipoison++ 
	c.getItems().deleteItem(260,1); // Delete herb
	c.getItems().deleteItem(5936,1); // Delete coconut milk
}

Unfortunately its not working.
Did I do something wrong? It did worked for some other things like:

if (itemUsed == 985 && useWith == 987 || itemUsed == 987 && useWith == 985) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(985, c.getItems().getItemSlot(985),1);
c.getItems().deleteItem(987, c.getItems().getItemSlot(987),1);
c.getItems().addItem(989,1);
}
